member.name: T:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.ActionFilters.Detection.IDetectRobots
member.summary: This interface describes the contract for components that can detect Robots.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.ActionFilters.Detection.IDetectRobots.DetectRobot
member.summary: Performs a check to see if the current request could be submitted by a robot

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.ActionFilters.Detection.IDetectRobots.IsNotARobot
member.summary: Clear the detectors internal state, we are not dealing with a robot

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.ActionFilters.Detection.IDetectRobots.FlagAsRobot
member.summary: We are dealing with a robot, shields up

member.name: F:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.ActionFilters.ReCaptchaMode.PreventRobots
member.summary: Captcha initially is not shown, but when a robot is detected it will show on until dismissed

member.name: P:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Configuration.ReCaptchaSettings.DetectionThreshold
member.summary: Value for supplying the amount of lenience we are willing to show robots

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaClient.VerifyAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies the supplied token with ReCaptcha Api
member.param: Token received from the ReCaptcha UI
Key entered by user in the secrets
member.returns: A boolean indicating if the token is valid

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaService.MaybeThisIsARobot
member.summary: Flags the behavior as that of a robot

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaService.IsThisARobot
member.summary: Determines if the request has been made by a robot

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaService.ThisIsAHuman
member.summary: Clears all robot markers, we are dealing with a human

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaService.VerifyCaptchaResponseAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Verifies the ReCaptcha response with the ReCaptcha webservice

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Services.ReCaptchaService.ValidateCaptchaAsync(System.Action{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Validates the captcha that is in the Form of the current request

member.name: P:OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.TagHelpers.ReCaptchaTagHelper.Language
member.summary: The two letter ISO code of the language the captcha should be displayed in When left blank it will fall back to the default OrchardCore language
